dev: npm run dev-backend & npm run dev-frontend --clearScreen false
devv: tmux new-session -d -s <session-name> 'npm run dev-backend' \; split-window -v 'npm run dev-frontend' \; attach-session -t <session-name>
devh: tmux new-session -d -s <session-name> 'npm run dev-backend' \; split-window -h 'npm run dev-frontend' \; attach-session -t <session-name>
